verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.
¶ And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> all that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H1481>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, because they were <S%H7227>many<s%>: and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H6973>distressed<s%> because <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, Now shall this <S%H6951>company<s%> lick <S%H3897>up<s%> all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> us, as the <S%H7794>ox<s%> licketh <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H3418>grass<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>. And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>.

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> therefore unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> to <S%H6604>Pethor<s%>, which is by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7121>call<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, there is a <S%H5971>people<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: behold, they <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and they <S%H3427>abide<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> me:

<S%H3212>Come<s%> now therefore, I pray thee, <S%H779>curse<s%> me this <S%H5971>people<s%>; for they are too <S%H6099>mighty<s%> for me: peradventure I shall <S%H3201>prevail<s%>, that we may <S%H5221>smite<s%> them, and that I may drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: for I <S%H3045>wot<s%> that he whom thou <S%H1288>blessest<s%> is <S%H1288>blessed<s%>, and he whom thou <S%H779>cursest<s%> is <S%H779>cursed<s%>.

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> with the rewards of <S%H7081>divination<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3885>Lodge<s%> here this <S%H3915>night<s%>, and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto me: and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> with <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H582>men<s%> are these with thee?

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto me, saying,

Behold, there is a <S%H5971>people<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H3212>come<s%> now, <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them; peradventure I shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>overcome<s%> them, and drive them <S%H1644>out<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H3212>go<s%> with them; thou shalt not <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: for they are <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3212>Get<s%> you into your <S%H776>land<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to give me <S%H5414>leave<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> with you.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and they <S%H935>went<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to <S%H1980>come<s%> with us.
¶ And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%>, <S%H7227>more<s%>, and more <S%H3513>honourable<s%> than they.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>, Let nothing, I pray thee, <S%H4513>hinder<s%> thee from <S%H1980>coming<s%> unto me:

For I will <S%H3513>promote<s%> thee unto <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>great<s%> <S%H3513>honour<s%>, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> whatsoever thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> unto me: <S%H3212>come<s%> therefore, I pray thee, <S%H6895>curse<s%> me this <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, If <S%H1111>Balak<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> go <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6996>less<s%> or <S%H1419>more<s%>.
Now therefore, I pray you, <S%H3427>tarry<s%> ye also here this <S%H3915>night<s%>, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1696>say<s%> unto me <S%H3254>more<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> at <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, If the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> thee, rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> with them; but <S%H389>yet<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which I shall <S%H1696>say<s%> unto thee, that shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H860>ass<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

¶ And <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> because he <S%H1980>went<s%>: and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> for an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> against him. Now he was <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon his <S%H860>ass<s%>, and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5288>servants<s%> were with him.

And the <S%H860>ass<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and the <S%H860>ass<s%> turned <S%H5186>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H860>ass<s%>, to <S%H5186>turn<s%> her into the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a <S%H4934>path<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, a <S%H1447>wall<s%> being on this side, and a <S%H1447>wall<s%> on that side.

And when the <S%H860>ass<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, she <S%H3905>thrust<s%> herself unto the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and <S%H3905>crushed<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam's<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall<s%>: and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> her <S%H3254>again<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, where was no <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H5186>turn<s%> either to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And when the <S%H860>ass<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, she fell <S%H7257>down<s%> under <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>: and <S%H1109>Balaam's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H860>ass<s%> with a <S%H4731>staff<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H860>ass<s%>, and she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, What have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee, that thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%> me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%>?

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H860>ass<s%>, Because thou hast <S%H5953>mocked<s%> me: I <S%H3863>would<s%> there <S%H3426>were<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, for now would I <S%H2026>kill<s%> thee.

And the <S%H860>ass<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, Am not I thine <S%H860>ass<s%>, upon which thou hast <S%H7392>ridden<s%> ever since I was thine unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>? was I <S%H5532>ever<s%> <S%H5532>wont<s%> to do <S%H6213>so<s%> unto thee? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Nay.

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1540>opened<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and he bowed <S%H6915>down<s%> his head, and fell <S%H7812>flat<s%> on his <S%H639>face<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Wherefore hast thou <S%H5221>smitten<s%> thine <S%H860>ass<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%>? behold, I went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7854>withstand<s%> thee, because thy <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H3399>perverse<s%> before me:

And the <S%H860>ass<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> me, and <S%H5186>turned<s%> from <S%H6440>me<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%>: <S%H194>unless<s%> she had <S%H5186>turned<s%> from <S%H6440>me<s%>, surely now also I had <S%H2026>slain<s%> thee, and saved her <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>; for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that thou <S%H5324>stoodest<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> me: now therefore, if it displease <S%H7489%H5869>thee<s%>, I will get me back <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> with the <S%H582>men<s%>: but <S%H657>only<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto thee, that thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>. So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak<s%>.

¶ And when <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%>, he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him unto a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, which is in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, which is in the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> <S%H1366>coast<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, Lo, I am <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee: have I now any <S%H3201>power<s%> at <S%H3201>all<s%> to <S%H1696>say<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%>? the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>putteth<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, that shall I <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and they <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2351%H7155>Kirjath-huzoth<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> that were with him.
